title: Enhancing System Design Practical Competencies: Biomechanics-Integrated Mathematics Education Course

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze biomechanical cases with over 80% accuracy using mathematical modeling.

Teams achieve a score of 70 or above on the evaluation rubric for their bioengineering-mathematics integrated project developed by the team
